benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: DELETE /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/tags - Remove tags from invoice item

covered: Valid deletion scenarios covered: removal of all tags, removal of specific tags (tagDef), and support for optional headers resulting in 204.
Non-existent resource handling: 404 when invoice item does not exist.
Comprehensive parameter coverage for tagDef variations and extra query parameters (present, empty, omitted, extra).
Error handling for invalid inputs: invalid invoiceItemId format, missing header, invalid token, malformed/partial tagDef.
Concurrency and performance considerations addressed with a high-concurrency test.
Edge cases including no tags on item and special characters in headers are covered.
Integration/service availability and accessibility considerations are included.
gaps: Soft delete semantics for tag removal are not explicitly tested.
Authorization path for 403 Forbidden is not tested (only 401).
Rate limiting / throttling scenarios are not tested.
Caching behavior (ETag / Cache-Control) is not tested.
Internal server error pathways beyond 503 (e.g., 500) are not covered.
recommendations: Add a dedicated test for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions.
Introduce rate-limiting tests to verify throttling behavior.
Add caching tests for ETag and Cache-Control headers.
Add tests for 500 Internal Server Error paths and other server errors.
Consider more explicit race-condition checks for true concurrent updates across invoice items.
If applicable, test soft-delete semantics of tags (e.g., state after deletion).
